title: 'Testing Kable Display '
author: "Steffen Hartleib"
date: '`r format(Sys.Date())`'
output:
  html_document:
    keep_md: yes
  pdf_document: default
---



```{r kable}
options(knitr.table.format = 'markdown')
n <- 100
x <- rnorm(n)
y <- 2*x + rnorm(n)
out <- lm(y ~ x)
library(knitr)
kable(summary(out)$coef, digits=2)
```
